author: Nick Statt
description: He’s being replaced by Joss Whedon
title: Justice League director Zack Snyder steps down due to family tragedy

author: Keely Flaherty
description: Joss Whedon will be stepping in to finish the film.
title: Zack Snyder Exits 'Justice League' In The Wake Of Daughter's Suicide

author: Katie Reilly
description: Joss Whedon will step in while Snyder focuses on his family
title: Justice League Director Zack Snyder Steps Down From Film After Daughter's Suicide

author: Justin Kroll, Variety
description: Joss Whedon will take over on "Justice League" so that Zack Snyder can be with his family.
title: Director Zack Snyder is leaving 'Justice League' after his daughter's suicide

description: Director known for Man Of Steel and 300 steps down to support his family, with Joss Whedon lined up to complete film
title: Justice League: Zack Snyder quits movie after daughter kills herself

author: Brian Truitt
description: Snyder's daughter committed suicide in March. Joss Whedon will oversee post-production 'Justice League' so the superhero epic can hit its November release date.
title: Zack Snyder steps away from 'Justice League' due to family tragedy

author: Borys Kit
description: The filmmaker's daughter died by suicide in March, prompting him to take a break from work and hire Joss Whedon to finish the Warner Bros. superhero pic: "I’ve decided to take a step back from the movie to be with my family, be with my kids, who really need me."
title: Zack Snyder Steps Down From 'Justice League' to Deal With Family Tragedy
